alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:50PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Meade, northeastern Custer and south central Pennington Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 150 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rapid City to 4 miles southeast of Black Gap to 7 miles east of Hermosa. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Caputa, Folsom, Farmingdale, Rapid City Airport, Hart Ranch, Black Gap, Reptile Gardens and Thompson Butte. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 57 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
